Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO SOCIAL SERVICES

Title: Relates to workplace safety equipment for social services employees
Summary: Requires every city or county social services district to provide a wearable or mobile phone-based panic button to each employee whose job responsibilities necessitate direct interaction with clients in a client's home.
LawCode: Add ยง63, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to providing panic buttons to certain employees of city and county social services districts
